title: sold - Ca. 1910 Never Wases & Has Beens Baseball Scene Postcard

posts.post_title: sold - Ca. 1910 Never Wases & Has Beens Baseball Scene Postcard
posts.post_content:
A neat postcard. Uncanceled back. Tiny corner crease and tiny protrusion in the upper background. (Sold, pending payment) $28 net to me, delivered.....thanks

[IMG]http://luckeycards.com/never.jpg[/IMG]
neat card! Nice pickup, Greg. Gotta blog that one.
